name: opencode-openai-codex-auth
description: OAuth authentication plugin for personal coding assistance with ChatGPT Plus/Pro subscriptions - uses OpenAI's official authentication method.

installation.summary: Install via npm and authenticate with your OpenAI/ChatGPT Plus account.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

```bash
npm install opencode-openai-codex-auth
```

Add to your OpenCode config:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["opencode-openai-codex-auth"]
}
```

Restart OpenCode and follow the OAuth authentication flow to connect your ChatGPT Plus/Pro account.

usage.markdown:
## Usage

After installation:

1. Run the authentication command
2. Follow the OAuth flow in your browser
3. Grant OpenCode access to your ChatGPT Plus/Pro subscription
4. Start using OpenAI models through your personal subscription

## Benefits

- Use your existing ChatGPT Plus/Pro subscription
- No additional API costs
- Official OpenAI authentication
- Secure OAuth flow
